chapters.title: Chapter 22: The End of a Legend
chapters.info: Jethari Moondancer, p. 361—Name by which Birgitte was known when she infiltrated the Tower of Ghenjei in an attempt to rescue Gail Cain. Her story was popular in Andor about a century ago. Birgitte does not know how the story got out, as Jethari died in the Tower—she had provisions for two months, and does not know how long she lasted after those ran out.
